name: 陳文輝
objective:
This course aims to learn artificial neural networks and how they are being used for machine learning. I will emphasize both the theoretical algorithms and the practical applications.

因老師請假至日本參加會議，9/12 當天不用上課，補課時間另行通知。
第一次上課自9/19開始。
(No class on September 12. The first day of this class is on September 19)
schedule:
1. Neural Networks Basics
2. Perceptrons
3. Hopfield Nets 
4. Restricted Boltzmann machines (RBMs)
5. Deep Neural Networks, including CNNs, RNNs, DQNs, GANs
6. Recent Development and Applications of Deep Neural Networks
7. Project Presentations
scorePolicy:
